home.parrafo_info: Renewable Energy Engineer, specialized in alternative sources for electricity generation, and currently preparing to be a Data Scientist and Front-End Developer. Passionate about solving mysteries and enigmas through patterns, data,and graphics.

sobre_mi.title: About me
sobre_mi.texto_sobre_mi:
I am a Renewable Energy Engineer and future Data Scientist. I am always looking to improve myself and learn more, which is why I have taken courses in Data Analysis, Front-End Development, and Project Management.

I´m a creative, self-taugh, and perceptive person, who likes to find creative solutions to the environment problems. Reason for that I have participated in scientific research summers, and projects related to sustainability and inclusion.

formacion.title: Education
formacion.formacion_4: Crece con Google Mujeres en STEM

proyectos.title: Projects
proyectos.info_proyecto_1: Game where the user must guess the secret word before the cowboy is on the gallows, the option to add new words is included.
proyectos.info_proyecto_2: Olimpo bookstore website: Discover new worlds in books; in which the reader can see the product catalog as well as its location.
proyectos.info_proyecto_3: Application that encrypts texts, to be able to exchange secret messages with other people who know the secret code.
proyectos.info_proyecto_4: Determination of the ideal location for a sushi restaurant in Culiacán, Sinaloa through unsupervised ML modeling.
proyectos.info_proyecto_5: BBVA's new mobile application model accessible to everyone's needs with the implementation of a single token for authentication. Work presented at the BBVA Hackathon 2022.
proyectos.info_proyecto_6: Analysis of the highest paid athletes in the world in the period from 1990 to 2020 by nationality, sport and monetary earnings ($).
